description: The Invesco S&P 500 Equal Weight Technology ETF (Fund) is based on the S&P 500 Equal Weight Information Technology Index (Index). The Fund will invest at least 90% of its total assets in securities that comprise the Index. The Index equally weights stocks in the information technology sector of the S&P 500 Index. The Fund and the Index are rebalanced quarterly.
name: Invesco S&P 500 Equal Weight Technology ETF
